name: Seal: A Slack Github PR Bot
description: A bot that notifies Slack about open GitHub PRs.

GITHUB_MEMBERS.description: Comma separated list of github members

GITHUB_USE_LABELS.description: Comma separated list of labels to include

GITHUB_EXCLUDE_LABELS.description: Comma separated list of labels to exclude

GITHUB_EXCLUDE_TITLES.description: Comma separated list of titles e.g (WIP) to exclude

QUOTES.description: Comma separated list of sentences you would like the Seal to post. Can be used for inspirational quotes or reminders.

SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: Your Slack Incoming Webhook token (obtainable at https://slack.com/services/new/incoming-webhook)

TZ.description: The timezone within which Seal operates (e.g. Australia/Melbourne)
